meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her anticigarette stance by refusing to be around smokers.
meanings.sent2: The anticigarette campaign aimed to educate people about the dangers of smoking.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave an anticigarette glare to the person smoking near it.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shot an anticigarette look at the cigarette in his hand.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with an anticigarette atmosphere, making smokers uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: A product or action designed to discourage or prevent smoking.
meanings.sent1: The new anticigarette gum helped many people quit smoking.
meanings.sent2: The government implemented an anticigarette policy in public places.
meanings.sent3: The anticigarette mascot danced around, promoting a smoke-free lifestyle.
meanings.sent4: The anticigarette billboard loomed large over the highway, warning drivers about the risks of smoking.
meanings.sent5: She always carried an anticigarette spray to ward off any secondhand smoke.
